LayoutData: The anchoring information for the slot
bAutoSize: When AutoSize is true we use the widget's desired size

methods.name: GetAlignment
methods.doc: Gets the alignment on the slot

methods.name: GetAnchors
methods.doc: Gets the anchors on the slot

methods.name: GetAutoSize
methods.doc: Gets if the slot to be auto-sized

methods.name: GetLayout
methods.doc: Gets the layout data of the slot

methods.name: GetOffsets
methods.doc: Gets the offset data of the slot, which could be position and size, or margins depending on the anchor points

methods.name: GetPosition
methods.doc: Gets the position of the slot

methods.name: GetSize
methods.doc: Gets the size of the slot

methods.name: GetZOrder
methods.doc: Gets the z-order on the slot

methods.name: SetAlignment
methods.doc: Sets the alignment on the slot

methods.name: SetAnchors
methods.doc: Sets the anchors on the slot

methods.name: SetAutoSize
methods.doc: Sets if the slot to be auto-sized

methods.doc: Sets the layout data of the slot
